overview: Welcome to another adventure into the Lost & Found universe! In this edition, you will find confident aging women, mounting evidence of Elvis Presley using “uppers, downers and pain killing drugs that he consumed in large quantities”, an incredible public karate performance, Captain Beefheart & his Magic Band, is Alex Jones really Bill Hicks, Todd Solondz promoting “Happiness” in 1998, Townes Van Zandt covering Hank Williams, super 8 footage from inside the apartment of artist Henry Darger, a special appearance by Crazy “F” Larry on The Geraldo Rivera Show, Kraftwerk live in 1970, Bjork attacking a reporter in Singapore, Jack Kerouac live on The Steve Allen Show, rare footage of Vampira, Werner Herzog realizing John Waters is gay, bizzaro Australian Saturday morning cartoon show, The Kinks in what is probably the L&F staff’s favorite performance on any of the 14 volumes so far, and SO MUCH MORE!!!!
title: Lost & Found Video Night Vol. 14
